item.title: Angular 2+: Base Component Alternative
item.description: Hello again, base functionality is an inevitable requirement. I’m going to talk about a different base component approach in the Angular. Most of the examples create a base component and inject services to it. Later, you create components from it. However, internet has many examples that could lead you to write bad code.
